DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test clinical efficacy oral Vitamin D3 Wound Healing patient Chronic Rhinosinusitis With Nasal Polyposis Lower Vitamin D Levels After Endonasal Endoscopic Sinus Surgery
DOC.brief_title: Effect Oral Vitamin D3 Chronic Rhinosinusitis Treatment Adults With Lower Vitamin D Levels
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical diagnosis Chronic Rhinosinusitis nasal polyp 2 . Be 1860 year old Chinese people either sex，the Han nationality 3 . Vitamin D level le 30 ng/ml 1 . Women must pregnant , breast feed 2 . Chronic oral corticosteroid therapy 3 . History physiciandiagnosed nephrolithiasis 4 . Chronic diseases（ diabetes，Hypertension，renal insufficiency , severe liver disease） 5.prior surgery paranasal sinuses 6 . With upper respiratory tract infection within 4 week enter study
